system.effect: The attack slices open the target's scalp, which immediately begins to bleed profusely, spilling into his eyes. The target suffers a -10 penalty to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill tests for the next [[1d10]] rounds. He must pass a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer Blood Loss.

description.value:
Rending Damage to Head (Severity 2)

The attack slices open the target's scalp, which immediately begins to bleed profusely, spilling into his eyes. The target suffers a -10 penalty to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill tests for the next [[1d10]] rounds. He must pass a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer Blood Loss.
